Changes
=======

This is the changelog for Dots...!

Tries to conform to the information on `Keep a CHANGELOG <http://keepachangelog.com>`_.


[Unreleased] (2016-07-21 / Present)
-----------------------------------

Added
^^^^^
* A basic TUI with yes/no questions and readable-formatting.
* Ability to dump the characteristics (position, desktop, title, etc.) of the
  windows open in your desktop-environment.
